Create a children's book series about the dog who could draw, where each book focuses on a different art medium or technique that the dog learns to use.
Develop an educational app that teaches kids how to draw using the techniques demonstrated by the dog in the book series.
Create a line of toys based on the dog, including plush toys and action figures that can be dressed up as different artists throughout history.
Organize a community art project where people are encouraged to create their own drawings inspired by the dog and share them online.

Host a virtual event where experts in various art fields give talks and workshops on different techniques that the dog has learned to use, and participants have the opportunity to ask questions and receive feedback from the experts.
